properties.name: label
properties.description: Set label for the input field

properties.name: required
properties.description: Added the small asterisk to the label in case if props set as true, that's mean that field is required to be fulfilled

properties.name: dataList
properties.description: Required for displaying data list for custom autocomplete component instance

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value and confirmModel as arguments and returns Boolean

properties.name: type
properties.description: Supported 4 base type like: day, month, year and custom. For day, month, year shouldn't be passed dataList because dataList is generated inside the Autocomplete component. For custom type dataList should be provided

properties.name: daysMounth
properties.description: Set up days count. For autocomplete component with type day

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes and on mounted hook

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes.
